H0.text: Beloved in 1999 was whose first movie since The Color Purple in 1985. Whoopi Goldberg

H1.text: Beloved in 1999 was whose first movie since The Color Purple in 1985. Danny Glover

H2.text: Beloved in 1999 was whose first movie since The Color Purple in 1985. Adolph Caesar

H3.text: Beloved in 1999 was whose first movie since The Color Purple in 1985. Oprah

A4.text: Glover also appeared in films such as Grand Canyon (1991) and Bopha! (1993).

A5.text: In 1998, he starred as Paul D. in the drama film Beloved, based on Toni Morrison's novel.

A6.text: Beloved (1998 film), based on the Toni Morrison novel.

A7.text: The Color Purple (1985 film), a 1985 film directed by Steven Spielberg, based on the novel.
